title: How to Store a Christmas Cake

steps.headline: Wrap your cake in cheesecloth / muslin that has been marinated in brandy, rum, wine or fruit juice.
Place the wrapped cake into an airtight container.
steps.description: If you do not have an airtight container, you can substitute plastic wrap if necessary.

steps.headline: Keep the cake in a dry and cool place.

tyn: Brandy or rum or wine or juice
text: Wrap your cake in cheesecloth / muslin that has been marinated in brandy, rum, wine or fruit juice.  Wrap it in aluminium foil.  Place the wrapped cake into an airtight container. If you do not have an airtight container, you can substitute plastic wrap if necessary. Keep the cake in a dry and cool place.
sentences: Wrap your cake in cheesecloth / muslin that has been marinated in brandy, rum, wine or fruit juice.
Place the wrapped cake into an airtight container.
If you do not have an airtight container, you can substitute plastic wrap if necessary.
Keep the cake in a dry and cool place.
